meanings.definition: An Italian dish consisting of a folded pizza dough filled with various ingredients such as cheese, meat, and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a delicious calzones for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant serves calzones with a variety of fillings.
meanings.sent3: My friend tried to juggle three calzones, but they all fell on the floor!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled out like a calzones bursting with cheese.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked calzones filled the kitchen.
